name: Exercise 2
description:
Navigate with arrow keys, press K to destroy the cubes, and escape to quit. 

For this exercise I tried to change the colors of the cubes, lerp them to new positions, change the quantities destroying them, as well as utilizing pingpong to change its scale. It was also my first attempt to incorporate assets into the scene. I tried to make it so that the cubes would be destroyed upon collision, but was unsuccessful. This is an area I'd look into further!
